job_history.work_description: Represent the dealership and abide by all the legal and ethical guidelines set forth under Federal Law. Present all available products to 100% of the purchasing customers 100% of the time. Explain all the benefits unique to each available product. Gather all the appropriate documentation required from each lending institution for each individual customer. Ensure all CITs are funded within set guidelines by the dealership.

Assisted customers with their New vehicle purchase/Lease with excellent counseling and product knowledge. Maintained a Customer Survey Index CSI of 100% (4.0) in the Buick, Cadillac, Chevrolet and GMC divisions.

Assisted customers with the purchase/lease of a new or pre-owned vehicle, by maintaining the knowledge of the current purchase/lease options offered by the manufacture. Maintained the best product knowledge of the entire product line.
Assisted customers with the purchase of the perfect Recreational Vehicle for their family. Extreme product knowledge was required due to a multiple line inventory, and floor plan availability.
Assisted customers with their vehicle purchase/lease. Through excellent counseling and product knowledge. Assisted the Used Car Manager with the daily activities of the Used Car Department.
Managed the used car inventory to include; appraisal's, auction purchases and sales, wholesale, deal desking, ongoing sales training, and the daily responsibilities of a Used Car Manager.

Responsible for the inventory of both locations with a total of approximately 200 units. Maintained the daily functions of the store such as personnel scheduling, deal desking, finance submissions, advertising in print and media form, floor plan management, and much more.

Assisted customers with their vehicle purchase/lease needs through excellent counseling and continued knowledge of current rebate availability as well as product knowledge to ensure the customers best selection of a vehicle.
Assembled, disassembled and maintained non-nuclear tactical weaponry.

skills.name: Sales Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in sales management roles, including managing inventory, personnel, and daily store functions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held various leadership roles, including General Sales Manager and Used Car Manager, demonstrating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has consistently provided excellent counseling and product knowledge to customers, showing strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Product Knowledge
skills.explanation: Has maintained extensive product knowledge in various industries, including automotive and recreational vehicles, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Has managed inventory in various roles, including Used Car Manager and General Sales Manager, showing strong proficiency in inventory management.

skills.name: Finance Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with finance submissions and deal desking, but limited experience in finance management, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has managed daily store functions and personnel, but limited experience in time management, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has provided excellent counseling to customers, but limited experience in communication, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has limited experience in problem-solving, but has managed daily store functions and personnel, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: No mention of Microsoft Office skills in the provided data.
